title: KJV Concord Wide-Margin Black Bonded Leather
features: The KJV Concord Wide-Margin Edition is extremely popular with KJV Bible scholars. It features wide margins all around the text for verse-by-verse annotations, as well as centre-column cross-references, a glossary, concordance, 15 colour maps and the Translators' Preface. This economical and practical edition is printed on a smooth, opaque and resilient paper and is case-bound in attractive black imitation leather .
description: A practical but attractive binding of the KJV Concord Wide-Margin Edition, in black imitation leather over boards
